'''Quest Domains''' (or Story Domains) are unique [[One-Time Domains|One-Time]] [[Domain]]s that can only be accessed as part of an [[Archon Quest|Archon]], [[Story Quest|Story]], or [[World Quest]]s. Once complete they can no longer be visited, hence, one should check for hidden [[chest]]s thoroughly.

Most entrances to Quest Domains are smoke-covered caves or broken structures, but some use existing domain entrances (such as [[The Great Adventurer Stanley]]).

After completing the Domain challenge, the smoke will usually disappear and the entrance will become a normal pile of stones. ([[Lost Treasure of Arcadia]] is the only exception, the smoke remains after completing the domain but can no longer be entered.)

[[Co-Op Mode]] is disabled while the player is in a Quest Domain.
